changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE job ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, token INT NOT NULL REFERENCES token(id), factbase VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, UNIQUE(factbase) );

CREATE TABLE result ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, job INT NOT NULL REFERENCES job(id), factbase VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, stdout TEXT NOT NULL, exit INT NOT NULL, msec INT NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, UNIQUE(job), UNIQUE(factbase) );

CREATE TABLE receipt ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, human INT NOT NULL REFERENCES human(id), job INT REFERENCES job(id), zents INT NOT NULL, summary VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL );
